I'm here for you. What's on your mind?"  ]

["I'm feeling down today": ["I feel like I'm not good enough"

"It's okay to feel like you're not good enough sometimes. Everyone feels that way at some point in their lives. But it's important to remember that you are good enough. You are worthy of love and respect. You are capable of great things. \n \nIt can be hard to believe those things when you're feeling down
column2: but it's important to try. Remind yourself of your strengths and accomplishments. Think about the people who love and care about you. And remember that you are always growing and learning. You are not perfect
column3: but that's okay. Perfection is not the goal. The goal is to be the best version of yourself that you can be. \n \nIf you're struggling to feel good about yourself
column4: there are things you can do to help. Talk to a friend or family member. See a therapist. Spend time doing things you enjoy. And remember that you are not alone. There are people who care about you and want to help. \n \nYou are good enough. You are worthy of love and respect. You are capable of great things. Believe in yourself. "]

["I'm feeling down today": ["why am I worthy of love and respect?"
"You are worthy of love and respect because you are a human being. You are a unique individual with your own thoughts
column3:
and experiences. You deserve to be treated with kindness and compassion. You deserve to be happy. 
 
You are worthy of love because you are capable of loving others. You are kind and compassionate. You are always willing to help others in need. You are a good friend and a good partner. 
 
You are worthy of respect because you are a person of integrity. You are honest and trustworthy. You are always willing to stand up for what you believe in. You are a role model to others. 
 
You are worthy of love and respect because you are you. You are a special person who deserves to be happy. Never forget that. "]
